job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongOur CompanystrongppGenista Biosciences is a rapidly growing biotech startup company based in San Jose CA dedicated to improving public health and food safety both on the community and global scaleppbrppstrongAbout the Rolestrongpp Collaborate with the UXUI design team to ensure that vision is being properly followedpp Implement backend functionalities for inhouse mobile and web applicationspp Provide ongoing maintenance support and enhancements to the existing platformpp Define front end architecture and components define user experience handle state and clientside experiencespp Perform integrations tasks of various modules and components that have been developed by other engineerspp Work with the development team to help define system architecturepp Perform rigorous testing and bugfixes on new and existing codepp Write scriptsprograms for performing testing automating tasks and controlling robotics systemsppbrppstrongQualificationsstrongpp BS or MS in Computer Science Computer Engineering or other technologyrelated fieldpp Experience with either iOS or Android app developmentpp Experience with web technologiesframeworks like React Django and NodeJSpp Preferred Languages JavaScript Java Swift Objective C PythonppbrppstrongAbout the PositionstrongppThis is a full time position with competitive salary and health vision dental and life insurance benefits that are fully covered by Genista with no outofpocket expenses Additional perks include gym membership free onsite lunch paid vacation and a casual working environmentp
